```{r}
setwd('~/UW/Student/STAT 551/H')
source('vcf4popgen.R')
source('inbr&knshp_est.R')
source('beta_dosage.R') # https://github.com/jgx65/hierfstat/blob/master/R/beta_dosage.R
```

```{r}
data <- vcf_preproc('H2/chr22_jpt.vcf')
```

Runtime experiment for inbr&knshp_est.R
```{r}
start <- Sys.time()
BETAS <- fBETA(data$d0, data$d1)
end <- Sys.time()
print(end - start)
```

Runtime experiment for beta_dosage.R
```{r}
start <- Sys.time()
betas <- beta.dosage(t(data$d0))
end <- Sys.time()
print(end - start)
```

Accuracy check
```{r}
BETAS <- round(BETAS, 4)
betas <- round(betas, 4)
mean(BETAS == betas)
```
